name: Open Game Night
description: Come enjoy a relaxed evening of gaming! All skill levels welcome.

name: Settlers of Catan Tournament
description: Compete in our popular Catan tournament! Prizes for top 3 players.

name: Learn to Play: Dungeons & Dragons
description: New to D&D? Join our beginner-friendly session with expert Dungeon Masters.

name: Board Game Brunch
description: Enjoy coffee, light brunch, and relaxed gaming with friends.

name: Chess Showdown
description: Challenge our cafes best! Win a drink voucher if you beat our champ.
